title: 'Dancing With the Stars' host Tom Bergeron misses Monday's show
text:
'Dancing With the Stars' host Tom Bergeron misses Monday's show Compiled by Tony Hicks Posted: 10/06/2015 10:10:17 AM PDT Updated: 10/06/2015 10:32:43 AM PDT "Dancing With the Stars" host Tom Bergeron missed Monday's episode of the hot ABC reality show so he could be with his sick father, according to CBS. 
The longtime host tweeted a photo Sunday of him as a young boy with his dad, captioned "I'll miss 2morrow's #dwts to be at my Dad's bedside. He's given me a lifetime of support. Time to return the favor." 
Alfonso Ribeiro, a former "DWTS" champ, filled-in. He wrote on Facebook, "I will be filling in for Tom Bergeron tomorrow night on Dancing With The Stars. I will be there with a heavy heart for my friend Tom and the Bergeron family." 
"Dancing with the Stars" airs at 8 p.m. ET on Mondays. Host Tom Bergeron with Zendaya and Val Chmerkovskiy listen to the judges' comments during 'Dancing with the Stars' on Monday, May 13, 2013.
